title: Current map of Runeterra?
body: Is there a current official map of Runeterra? The only ones I can find are the ones before The Great Retcon. Even beyond getting rid of the Institute of War, they don't make much sense. For example the Shadow Isles and Bilgewater are on opposite ends of the continent, yet in the new lore the mist hits Bilgewater first. Also Piltover and Zaun are two separate cities. And Targon doesn't exist.

Kia ora Efflam.

 I cant help but notice you're fairly new to these boards, are you by any chance a concept artist for Foundations team?

Whakawhetai koe ?

Yes, Foundations have been renamed WorldBuilding team ( because hey, that's what we do right ? haha )
I've been working on Shadow Isles for a year, and a little bit on Bandle City/Yordles.

Now I'm transitioning towards creating world-building **products **. While the world-building efforts are very important for the company to have a consistent universe across the board, we also need to show you some of those efforts as stories and content you can enjoy.

Holy shit, I'm so excited. :o

Efflam, that's a great opportunity for me to say that I LOVE your work! Been following your art for a few years now. :>

Now, there's been talk about unveiling some yordle & Bandle mysteries in the past couple of years or so, but nothing really popped up and Bandle City is still [a crest-less, mysterious, dense forest entrance.](https://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/region/bandle-city/) :P

It's become a known fact that Bandle and Void were more WIP than other regions when Universe first saw the light of day, because of how weird and different they are- Hence the lack of actual, fully-detailed crests and artwork- but now, do you think, _*PERSONALLY*_ (being the one working on these stuff and all), that you guys are getting closer and closer to revealing more of these two mystery lands, perhaps?
Or rather- Is any of the two areas consistent enough nowadays, internally, to be revealed to players, sooner than later possibly?

I'll understand if you can't answer. But you know, passion and all that. ;P

Thank you for the kind words <3 

Bandle City is in good hands ( Riot Whren, she worked on Targon and Noxus). That said, Bandle city will most likely remain the most mysterious place _not-quite in Runeterra._
I would say we would be much closer to ...Uncovering dusty Icathian manuscripts about the nature of the Void.
